editorialNotes.standard: Powered by the same code base that drives the iconic desktop image editor, the iPadOS version adds a customisable interface optimised for touch and Apple Pencil. Explore all that’s new with lessons on masking, composites and more.

This app offers the flexibility you’ve always wished for when taking notes on longer documents. Quickly drag excerpts to a separate workspace, make comments, compare distant sections and more. You’ll forget how you ever read without it.
editorialNotes.short: Easily make notes and comments on the documents you read.
1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3... Bring numbers to life with colors. 🖍🎨

editorialNotes.standard: Few things are more relaxing than settling down with a good coloring book—at least, until the kid we borrowed it from asks for it back. Pigment unleashes our grown-up creative energy with a surprisingly deep array of artist’s tools and tweaks. It even lets us automatically color within the lines, giving our productions a sheen of perfection. We expect a call from the gallery any day now.
editorialNotes.short: Get cracking with colours.
